name: JPinspirations
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: We all need positive statements in our lives. Start by speaking some positive words into your life daily. Come back here periodically for breaking inspirational words and brief messages.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
